Articles.Content:
How can I get the KSP to redo the latest update?

I must have loaded the wrong Mod and it crashes all the time so I reloaded the program and it needs the update.

Thanks if any one knows
Moved to Support. Did you buy KSP directly from Squad or through Steam?
crashes from mods are most likely memory issues. the way Unity loads textures right now is dumping everything on RAM
